snippet.title: Raiders of Valhalla | Trailer
snippet.description:
In Raiders of Valhalla you take control of your clan of dwarves and lead them into battle. Start with a group of Viking dwarves and initiate wars against vulnerable villages. As your troops plunder these villages, use the loot to strengthen them and advance against locations guarded by formidable enemy warriors!

Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2298620/Raiders_of_Valhalla/

How far will you be able to take your warriors? The journey to glory begins now! 

🎮 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AfilGames
🕹️ Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AfilGames
⚔️ Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/afilgames/
